summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney to Dr. Lisa Rocchio, attaching a draft expert notice regarding her anticipated testimony in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email requests Dr. Rocchio's review and scheduling of a call to confirm the notice's accuracy.

persons.name: Lisa Rocchio
persons.context: Addressed as Dr. Rocchio, she is the intended recipient of an email containing a draft expert notice regarding her anticipated testimony in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Maurene
persons.context: Sender of the email, working for the Southern District of New York, who is providing a draft expert notice to Dr. Rocchio for review related to the Maxwell case.

connections.description: Maurene, an AUSA, is coordinating with expert witness Dr. Rocchio regarding her testimony in the Maxwell case, as shown by the email providing a draft notice.

events.title: Draft Expert Notice Provided
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails Dr. Lisa Rocchio a draft expert notice intended for defense counsel in the Maxwell case regarding her anticipated testimony.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated April 19, 2021, from an AUSA named Maurene to Dr. Lisa Rocchio.
The email pertains to the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case, indicating preparation for expert testimony.
A draft expert notice is attached, intended for provision to Maxwell's defense counsel.
The AUSA's office is located at 1 St. Andrew's Plaza in New York, NY.
